references.reason: This paper introduced the foundational concept of strategic classification, which is the central theme of the current paper.

references.paper_title: Gaming helps! learning from strategic interactions in natural dynamics
references.reason: This paper relaxes the assumption that agents have full knowledge of the classifier, which is a key aspect of the current paper's model.
This paper studies the impact of incomplete information on strategic classification, directly addressing a problem also studied in the current paper.
This paper explores the optimal classifiers in settings where agents have partial or noisy information about the deployed model, directly informing the current paper's model.
This paper studies one-dimensional screening settings similar to those in the current paper, providing useful context and comparison.
